sentences.en: And uniquely - made rubber bushing block on the swirler benefits mixture delivery.
sentences.cn: 旋流器上壳内独制的橡胶衬套可利于混合料的输送.

sentences.en: As we discussed in the Introduction, interactive digital products are uniquely imbued with complex behavior.
sentences.cn: 而绪论所探讨的交互数字产品比较特殊,其设计充满了复杂的行为.

sentences.en: Because of the extreme cold, the Antarctic is a uniquely fragile environment.
sentences.cn: 极度严寒造成了南极地区绝无仅有的脆弱环境。

sentences.en: China is a land of scenic contrasts , each uniquely representing its own area.
sentences.cn: 祖国山水,风格多样;多样的风格, 相对应而存在,相比较而多姿.

sentences.en: He could determine uniquely the properties of the compound.
sentences.cn: 他能够用独特的方法测定出这一化合物的性质.

sentences.en: Henry belonged to uniquely articulate, sensitive, and lively - minded family.
sentences.cn: 亨利一家都特别长于表达,善感而敏思.

sentences.en: Ms Wu, with her " large sonic vocabulary ", was uniquely qualified.
sentences.cn: 拥有 “ 丰富的声汇量 ” 的吴女士当之无愧.

sentences.en: Satellites are uniquely suited to provide this information.
sentences.cn: 只有人造卫星能提供此类信息。

sentences.en: The author names several figures as uniquely lying on their side.
sentences.cn: 作者设计出了一些完全只向着他们这一边的人物形象.

sentences.en: The conservatives were not preoccupied uniquely with economic affairs or growth.
sentences.cn: 保守派并非仅仅优先考虑经济事务或经济增长.

sentences.en: The precise molecular weight that is measured can be uniquely associated with a specific moleculer formular.
sentences.cn: 测得的准确分子量与具体的分子式完全吻合.

sentences.en: The uniquely - grooved skull allows the snake's eyes to converge forward.
sentences.cn: 凹进去的独特头骨也能让蛇眼聚焦.

sentences.en: They began to walk between rows of uniquely constructed tombs.
sentences.cn: 他们开始在一排排构造特殊的坟墓中间行走.

sentences.en: This renewal keeps our bones incredibly strong and uniquely adaptable.
sentences.cn: 这种更新使我们的骨骼异常坚硬,适应性奇强.

sentences.en: Uniquely among the great world religions, Buddhism is rooted only in the universal experience of suffering known to all human beings.
sentences.cn: 与世界其他主要宗教不同的是，佛教是唯一基于全人类所共知的苦难而产生发展起来的。

words.tran_cn: 独特的，稀罕的；[数] 唯一的，独一无二的
独特性；独一无二；单值性
